mapper.select:
select from t_wf_doc_share_strategy t1 where 1=1
and t1.proc_def_id=#{proc_def_id}
and
t1.doc_name like concat('%', #{item} , '%')
and t1.doc_type =#{doc_type}
and
exists (select t2.audit_strategy_id from t_wf_doc_share_strategy_auditor t2 where t2.audit_strategy_id=t1.id and t2.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%'))
order by case when t1.doc_id != 'all_user_doc_lib' and t1.doc_id != 'all_department_doc_lib' and t1.doc_id != 'all_custom_doc_lib' then 1 else 0 end, t1.create_time desc
select doc_id as docId, doc_name as docName from t_wf_doc_share_strategy where proc_def_id = #{procDefId}
mapper.delete: DELETE t1 FROM t_wf_doc_share_strategy_auditor t1, t_wf_doc_share_strategy t2 WHERE t1.audit_strategy_id = t2.id AND t2.proc_def_id = #{procDefId}
